quizzes.name: Maurya Empire

quizzes.name: Ashoka the Great Quiz

quizzes.name: Gupta Empire and Golden Age

quizzes.name: Delhi Sultanate
quizzes.description: Assess your knowledge of the Delhi Sultanate, a Muslim kingdom based primarily in Delhi that stretched over large parts of the Indian subcontinent for 320 years.

quizzes.name: Mughal Empire
quizzes.description: Test your expertise on the Mughal Empire, which is known for its rich cultural heritage, monumental architecture, and significant impact on the history of India.

quizzes.name: Maratha Empire and Shivaji
quizzes.description: Explore the rise of the Maratha Empire under Shivaji's leadership, known for his military tactics, governance reforms, and the establishment of a competent and progressive administration.

quizzes.name: Sikh Empire and Maharaja Ranjit Singh

quizzes.name: Revolt of 1857 Quiz

quizzes.name: Indian National Congress Timeline
quizzes.description: Delve into the chronological events of the Indian National Congress, from its formation in 1885 to its pivotal role in the Indian independence movement and post-independence era.

quizzes.name: Non-Cooperation & Civil Disobedience Movement Quiz
quizzes.description: Explore the major non-violent movements led by Mahatma Gandhi against British rule, focusing on the Non-Cooperation and Civil Disobedience movements and their impact on the Indian independence struggle.

quizzes.name: Quit India Movement
quizzes.description: Explore the pivotal moments of the Quit India Movement, a major part of the Indian independence struggle against British rule.

quizzes.name: Indian Post-Independence History

quizzes.description: Assess your knowledge of the Emergency Era in India, a period marked by political unrest and constitutional change.

quizzes.name: British East India Company Rule
quizzes.description: Examine the era of British East India Company rule in India, focusing on its strategies, administration, and the impact on Indian society.

quizzes.name: Socio-Religious Reform Movements in India
quizzes.description: Uncover the transformative socio-religious reform movements in India that aimed to address social injustices and introduce progressive ideas.

quizzes.description: Explore the fierce tribal uprisings that occurred in colonial India as indigenous communities resisted British dominance.

quizzes.name: Women in Indian Independence Movement
quizzes.description: Discover the crucial roles played by women in the Indian Independence Movement, highlighting their contributions and struggles.

quizzes.name: Princely States & Integration
quizzes.description: Analyze the integration of princely states into modern India post-independence, focusing on the diplomatic negotiations and strategies used.

quizzes.name: History of Indian Currency & Economy
quizzes.description: Trace the evolution of Indian currency and economic policies from ancient times through modern day.

quizzes.name: Indian Political History Post-1947
